Question.Subject: Streaming live video windows bases flash or other?
Question.Content: I'm trying to stream live video of an event to a network device for digital signage, i've tried windows media encoder and it works fine but is limited to 4 connections and I have 13. We don't have a flash server so can't try that. I was just wondering if anybody knows any other software or way to stream live video to an ip address as I have to point it at a network address in order for it to work. Thank in advance for your suggestions
